Content.Text:
<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Wah, it's you, <MYNAME>? You really
surprised me! Is everything okay?

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good, glad to hear that. Sorry if I
surprised you. I was just about to head
out.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I've had a little trouble, to tell you
the truth.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I was going to just take a walk and
clear my head. Do you want to come with
me, <MYNAME>?
I don't really feel like it
I'll go with you

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Okay, I understand. I'm still going to
go, so can you get out my house, please?

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Sorry. See you later.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Let's go. I'll take you to a really
special spot today.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, this way. Come on, move it!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Get up here! It feels great!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
What? I'm too fast? Not at all! You're
too slow, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh come on, I'm just kidding! No need
to get all angry.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is my special spot. Take a look.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Look at that raging water! Really feels
great to look at, doesn't it?
<PAGE>
When I'm here I can forget everything
bad and just relax. You understand what
I mean, right, <MYNAME>?
What bad things?
I understand totally

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
You want me to remember it? After I've
finally forgotten it?
<PAGE>
Surely there can't be any fun to be had
listening to other people's troubles?
<PAGE>
I'm happy to have my girlfriend worried
about me, but don't push me too hard,
okay?

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Argh, that's ruined my good mood again.
Let's go.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thanks for coming all the way out here
with me. It cheered me up.
<PAGE>
I'm just going to forget my troubles,
and please, you forget all this too.
<PAGE>
Right, I'm off.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I knew you would! That's why we're
together, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Something fun did happen the other day,
actually! Let me tell you about it.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Phew... I feel better for having talked
like this with you. I feel so much
better!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You enjoyed yourself too, did you? I'm
glad to hear it.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>. You really do understand me
pretty well, don't you?
<PAGE>
Thanks for not asking for any details.
That made me really happy.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>If I'm worried about anything else, can
I come and see you? Your smile really
helps to cheer me up.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
G-Great, thanks. You can come and see
me, too, if you every need to. I'll make
you laugh.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Shall we head home, anyway? I'll walk
you back to your house.
<PAGE>
Let's go, <MYNAME>.
